casebody.data:
State
v.
Avenger Ridgeway 273A01-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016 Mr. Avenger D. Ridgeway, Polkton, Pro Per. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, for the State. Jon David, District Attorney, for the State. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of March 2016 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016." Ervin, J., recused.
